abstract: Qatar has emerged as world's biggest supplier of liquified natural gas, accounting for one-third of global market; nation has invested tens of billions of dollars to put itself at forefront of industry, constructing facilities that chill liquid to -260 degrees, making it far more efficient to ship; industry has made Qatar world's wealthiest nation by output per capita.
lead_paragraph: A rich natural gas field and a fleet of ships has turned Qatar, once a poor nation of fishers and pearl divers, into a major player in the global energy trade.

headline.main: Liquefied Natural Gas Makes Qatar an Energy Giant
headline.print_headline: Gas Makes Qatar a Giant in Energy

snippet: A rich natural gas field and a fleet of ships has turned Qatar, once a poor nation of fishers and pearl divers, into a major player in the global energy trade.
